'''Fireball''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
* {{EntityLink|Fireball}}, an explosive projectile fired by [[ghast]]s

** {{EntityLink|Fire Charge}}, a craftable item used to light fires and shoot small fireballs
* {{EntityLink|Dragon Fireball}}, a projectile fired by [[ender dragon]]s
